 1999-01391999-02-040,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the RELATED PARTY TRANSACTIONS (TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS which allow a company controlled by a foreign bank to enter into prescribed transactions with the foreign bank that controls it or with another financial institution controlled by the same foreign bank as itself.
